metadata.name: Time is a Dragon
metadata.description:
♾️Time is a dragon, the oldest of dragons. It burns and swallows everything in its path. There was only one way to survive in the vortex it had created: change. Everything that does’nt change deserves death, according to Time♾️

(The artwork is a contemporary interpretation of the painting "Lady with an Ermine" by Leonardo da Vinci, 1489-1491)
